description: Controversy over the Confederate battle flag has escalated across Southern states in the wake of the racially motivated killings at Emanuel A.M.E. Church in June.
title: Driving the South’s Flag Divide
title_page: Driving the South’s Flag Divide - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Controversy over the Confederate battle flag has escalated across Southern states in the wake of the racially motivated killings at Emanuel A.M.E. Church in June.
